body:
Yep - was trying after that commit. With a version number in schema.rb, the
schema_migrations table comes up empty after a schema load.

On Sat, Dec 8, 2012 at 4:04 PM, Josh Susser <notifications@github.com>wrote:

> @jeremy <https://github.com/jeremy>: 0c692f4<https://github.com/rails/rails/commit/0c692f4>is incomplete - there were a couple issues resolved in later commits. Check
> that again after floating to 036d3e1<https://github.com/rails/rails/commit/036d3e1>and see what's up?
>
> —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub<https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/8399#issuecomment-11164932>.
>
>
